DOC.brief_summary: The RATCHET study assesses if patient knowledge of estimated cardiovascular risk at current and recommended target blood pressure levels improves compliance in the management of hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Risk Assessment and Treat Compliance in Hypertension Education Trial
DOC.criteria: Essential hypertension (new diagnosis or established diagnosis) meeting criteria for pharmacologic therapy as defined by current guidelines Lack of written informed consent Previous myocardial infarction Previous stroke Congestive heart failure Stage 3 or greater chronic kidney disease Pregnancy Usage of medication bubble/blister package
